name: temperature
impact: Lower values make output more deterministic and focused, higher values increase creativity and variation

name: max_tokens
description: Maximum number of tokens to generate
impact: Limits response length; set appropriately for your use case to control costs and response completeness

name: top_p
impact: Alternative to temperature; lower values focus on more likely tokens

name: frequency_penalty
description: Penalizes repeated tokens based on frequency
impact: Positive values reduce repetition; useful for creative tasks

name: presence_penalty
description: Penalizes tokens based on presence in text
impact: Encourages topic diversity; useful for brainstorming

name: stop
description: Sequences where the API will stop generating
impact: Useful for controlling output format and preventing overgeneration
